Sweet! It's just like what Robbaz did in this video!
Its like an ad for HOC Gaming's Space tourism series. He made a Laythe resort.

I think Bob got there first

http://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/1118303593847911308/9092E5681233E7FCFAEBB6F1A107D2D118B7CA17/
Lovely artwork; it reminds me of those 1930's airline travel ads.

After three years on Laythe waiting for a rescue mission, only to see the rescue ship tip over and blow up just like their ship did (except that the rescue ship blew up its capsule, too), I think my Bill and Jeb would dispute how lovely a place it is...
Is it just me or is the post horribly broken?
